messages.message:
Can we polish the wording here? If it's not too late. (FYI, you can get quick feedback on UI text like this in <#C05NKL85Y2G|>!)

> Update this app before December 18 to fix a security vulnerability. Apps that aren't updated won't work after this date.
this would be a quick change! not sure if it’s worth backporting to 23.47, but we could definitely backport this to 23.49

The tone change probably isn't worth backporting, however it's confusing that we say "republish" when what we mean is "update." In the UI, publishing an app means filling out a form to submit your app to Instabase for publishing.

hmm actually i think this warning needs to be shown on 23.47 before 23.49 is deployed

the plan is to deploy 23.49 on Dec 18, at which point the apps with these warnings will break :disappointed:

i don’t think it’s worth doing another 23.47 prod push for the tone change, so maybe we’ll stick with the current wording for now :disappointed:

i agree with you on the “update” vs “republish” wording, though
